name: Acupuncture
description: This incredible method of healing is an ancient part of traditional Chinese medicine. It helps the body find its natural balance.

name: Aroma Therapy
description: Aromatherapy is a gentle yet powerful healing technique that uses pure essential oils to promote physical, emotional, and spiritual well-being.

name: Diet Therapy
description: Food is more than a mere medium of sustenance, it is a form of medicine. What you eat can have a crucial impact on your overall health and well-being.

name: Heliotherapy
description: Heliotherapy uses the healing powers of the sun to treat skin ailments and promote overall health and well-being.

name: Hydrotherapy
description: Not only is water an essential element of life, but it also has incredible healing properties. We bring to you the power of water in healing.

name: Massage Therapy
description: Massages have been used as a form of therapy since ancient times. There are many benefits to this age-old practice of healing.

name: Physiotherapy
description: A hands-on healing technique that focuses on restoring mobility, function, and quality of life through natural therapies.

name: Yoga
description: Yoga, an ancient Indian tradition, is a group of physical, mental, and spiritual practices that have stood the test of time.
